seo.title: Markku Customs: High-Quality Custom Gaming PCs
seo.description: Welcome to Markku Customs! We build custom gaming PCs using both new and refurbished high-quality components.

hero.heading:
We Build.
You Play.
hero.description: Welcome to Markku Customs! We build custom gaming PCs using both new and refurbished high-quality components. Our experienced technicians can help you create a machine that delivers the performance and reliability you need. We also offer upgrades, repairs, and maintenance services. Contact us today to learn more and start your custom build!
